overview:
With over 12 years of technology and business experience in the technology world and running a number of companies, Harry is a technology entrepreneur. He has Managed and developed Technology solutions for organizations between 5 to 200 Million in revenue and worked at Fortune 50, 100, 500 companies, Hedge funds, Internet Startups and dotcoms.

After graduating from the University of Western Ontario with a BA in Statistical Sciences in London, Ontario, Harry moved back out west and moved the the US for the next few years during the dot com boom. During this time, Harry worked as a contractor for companies such as Microsoft and HP, discovering his passion for consulting which led to the formation of Comet Computing a technology consulting firm which had large contracts with private and publicly traded companies.

Comet Computing is a Microsoft Gold Partner and a leader in the technology consulting field, that specializes in helping companies optimize their technology infrastructure and spend by providing custom software development solutions (ERP, CRM, Internet), building infrastructure and data centers and working with IT departments.
